language.subtitle: the openamq whiteboard
language.content:
OpenAMQ.org Wiki ****************
This is the developer's whiteboard.
- The wiki is currently accessible to everyone who visits this site. - Anyone can edit the wiki. - The OpenAMQ team may undo edits that they do not feel are useful.
[http://wiki.openamq.org/cgi-bin/wiki:Go to the developer's wiki].
